Metadata.Title: CVE-2021-36374 affecting package javapackages-bootstrap for versions less than 1.14.0-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2021-36374 affecting package javapackages-bootstrap for versions less than 1.14.0-2. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package javapackages-bootstrap is earlier than 1.14.0-2, affected by CVE-2021-36374
